title: It won't let me in my account
body: I try log in to my league account, but it literally will not let me, I used the same exact user and password for logging into this account on the website, please help

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you're able to access the website with the same credentials you're attempting to login to the game with, it's possible your client may be patched to the wrong region, please ensure you have the correct region selected from your launcher.

http://puu.sh/sfwAM/73dd27f3b8.png

Hey,

May I add this is only happening in the new client, and I can access my league account in the legacy client.
The region and language is the same to the websites, and I'm really not sure what's happening, maybe
this is just a bug?
